name: Lesser Acts Of Piracy
description:
Pirate Altruism? I think not.

You're a pirate in a race to treasure island. Alas, you'll never beat the other ships with all this extra cargo. Why not gift the competition some of that cargo to lighten the load and go faster. Hoist the sails, ya sea dog, there's a race to be won!

Controls

Left click to launch a cargo chest

A, D (Arrow keys, Numpad 4,6) to turn left and right

Q, D to look around

Jam

Lesser Acts of Piracy was create for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3, with the theme 'Less is More'. The game is about getting less cargo to gain more speed, and win the race. And compete against the AI trying to do the same.
